# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(MOAB_database)

ADD_DATABASE_CODE_GEN_TARGETS(MOAB)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
MOABPluginInfo.C
MOABCommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES
MOABPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
MOABMDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtMOABFileFormat.C
avtMOABOptions.C
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
MOABEnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtMOABFileFormat.C
avtMOABWriter.C
avtMOABOptions.C
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${VISIT_DATABASE_INCLUDES}
)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(IMOABDatabase ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IMOABDatabase visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IMOABDatabase)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(MMOABDatabase ${LIBM_SOURCES})
    TARGET_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(MMOABDatabase PRIVATE ${MOAB_INCLUDE_DIR} ${HDF5_INCLUDE_DIR})
    TARGET_LINK_DIRECTORIES(MMOABDatabase PRIVATE ${MOAB_LIBRARY_DIR} ${HDF5_LIBRARY_DIR} )
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(MMOABDatabase visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser ${MOAB_LIB} ${HDF5_LIB} )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(MMOABDatabase MDSERVER)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} MMOABDatabase)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(EMOABDatabase_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(EMOABDatabase_ser PRIVATE ${MOAB_INCLUDE_DIR} ${HDF5_INCLUDE_DIR})
TARGET_LINK_DIRECTORIES(EMOABDatabase_ser PRIVATE ${MOAB_LIBRARY_DIR} ${HDF5_LIBRARY_DIR} )
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EMOABDatabase_ser visitcommon avtpipeline_ser avtdatabase_ser ${MOAB_LIB} ${HDF5_LIB} )
ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EMOABDatabase_ser ENGINE)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EMOABDatabase_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(EMOABDatabase_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(EMOABDatabase_par PRIVATE ${MOAB_MPI_INCLUDE_DIR} ${HDF5_MPI_INCLUDE_DIR})
    TARGET_LINK_DIRECTORIES(EMOABDatabase_par PRIVATE ${MOAB_MPI_LIBRARY_DIR} ${HDF5_MPI_LIBRARY_DIR} )
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EMOABDatabase_par visitcommon avtpipeline_par avtdatabase_par ${MOAB_MPI_LIB} ${HDF5_MPI_LIB} )
    ADD_TARGET_DEFINITIONS(EMOABDatabase_par ENGINE)
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EMOABDatabase_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_OUTPUT_DIR(databases ${INSTALLTARGETS})
VISIT_PLUGIN_TARGET_FOLDER(databases MOAB ${INSTALLTARGETS})
